description.raw:
The strip command in Ubuntu Disco is failing to generate the -dbg package because is trying to copy `dwz` files over themselves. I add a check here to the tool to avoid it.

Failing here [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo9-debbuilder/481/consoleFull#-15259915806ea37b8d-a6d4-40ae-8431-d90c018842af](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo9-debbuilder/481/consoleFull#-15259915806ea37b8d-a6d4-40ae-8431-d90c018842af)

Good build with this PR:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo9-debbuilder&build=483)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo9-debbuilder/483/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo9-debbuilder/483/))

title: Fix dh strip disco
